entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Take a Big Step Toward Approval, Analysts Say
entry.summary: BlackRock's application led the way on Friday, as an ETF analyst predicted that we could see a $100 billion Bitcoin ETF in as little as five years.

entry.title: Report Crypto Trades Over $10K to IRS or Face Jail? It’s Complicated
entry.summary: A new tax law appears to have massive implications for crypto users. But who it might affect, and when, is not so straightforward.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF: This Is the 'Calm Before the Storm', Says ETF Analyst
entry.summary: Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas joins Farokh Sarmad, Michael Anderson, and Ovie Faruq on the FOMO Hour to share the latest intel on the looming approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF, what might happen when the very different worlds of TradFi and crypto collide, and his insights on “Genslish,” the unique and strategic language of SEC chair Gary Gensler.

entry.title: Pixels Game Airdrop Announced—Here’s How to Get Pixel Tokens
entry.summary: Airdrops continue to keep crypto believers enthralled, further fueled by Pixels’ latest announcement.

entry.title: Anthropic Says It Won’t Use Your Private Data to Train Its AI
entry.summary: As AI companies hungrily consume every trove of data they can find, the makers of Claude.AI say they won’t their its own customers' work to improve its chatbot.

entry.title: 'Bitcoin's Time Has Arrived': ETF Hopefuls Eagerly Await SEC Decision
entry.summary: ETF hopeful Hashdex releases a Bitcoin advert as analysts speculate that the SEC’s decision on Bitcoin ETFs may be imminent.

entry.title: Celsius to Unstake $466 Million Ethereum Holdings, 'Ensure Ample Liquidity' for Creditors
entry.summary: Celsius accounts for almost a third of ETH awaiting withdrawal, as it begins "recalling and rebalancing assets" ahead of asset distributions.

entry.title: Saga Airdrop Coming Ahead of Blockchain Launch—Here’s Who Is Eligible
entry.summary: Some Polygon, Avalanche, Cosmos, and Celestia users will be included in Saga’s community token airdrop.

entry.title: ‘We’re Not Here to Sell You Another ChatGPT’: Perplexity AI CEO
entry.summary: Co-founder Aravind Srinivas wants to change the perception of generative AI through a trustworthy "answer engine."

entry.title: Solana’s LFG Token Lures Ethereum Users, Plans Second Airdrop and Grants Program
entry.summary: Solana's “Less Fn Gas” airdropped LFG tokens to Ethereum users who spent over $4,269 in gas over the last year. It doesn't want to stop there.

entry.title: Logan Paul Launches CryptoZoo NFT ‘Buyback,’ Files Countersuit As Legal Battles Rage On
entry.summary: The famous YouTuber and influencer alleges two of his CryptoZoo co-creators engaged in “nefarious trading activity.”

entry.title: Blame Human Lawyers, Not Tech, for Courtroom Blunders: Robin AI Cofounder
entry.summary: Robin AI is taking on hallucinations and other thorny issues to ensure tech is an effective courtroom partner.

entry.title: Financial Advisors Are Still Skeptical SEC Approves Bitcoin ETF, Bitwise Says
entry.summary: Only 39% of 437 financial advisors polled said they think we'll see a Bitcoin ETF available to U.S. investors in 2024.

entry.title: Beam Token Up 36% as Merit Circle Network Transactions Hit All-Time High
entry.summary: The Avalanche subnet token is climbing back toward its highest price ever.

entry.title: Microsoft Adds Dedicated AI Key to Windows 11 Keyboard
entry.summary: Cortana didn’t fare much better than Clippy, but the Redmond-based tech giant is betting that Copilot will finally earn its spot at our fingertips.

entry.title: Nikon, Sony, and Canon Pitch a New Way to Fight Deepfakes
entry.summary: Instead of watermarking AI images, top cameramakers propose encoding signatures into real photos instead.

entry.title: Grayscale, VanEck and ARK Bitcoin ETFs Register to Trade on Exchanges
entry.summary: Two more Bitcoin ETF applicants have gotten the green light to have their funds listed on exchanges—but it's all pending SEC approval.

entry.title: Bitcoin Rebounds From Flash Crash as Market Fixates on ETF
entry.summary: BTC has recovered losses after slipping briefly yesterday on fears that Bitcoin ETFs might again be denied or delayed.

entry.title: Privacy Coins Monero, Zcash, Horizen 'At Risk' of Delisting by Binance
entry.summary: Binance has flagged several privacy coins with a "monitoring tag" indicating that they are at risk of being delisted from its platform.

entry.title: Here's What's Coming to Xbox Game Pass
entry.summary: Microsoft's Xbox Game Pass is adding more indie games to its subscription service, as well as a few big names. Here's a look at the lineup.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF: Is It Priced In?
entry.summary: Analysts are split on whether the long-awaited approval of a Bitcoin ETF will halt BTC’s momentum, or pump the cryptocurrency even higher.

entry.title: Fidelity Bitcoin ETF Set to Trade on CBOE—But No Word From SEC
entry.summary: The Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin Trust got the ok to trade on the CBOE under the FBTC ticker, but there's still no word from the SEC.

entry.title: Supreme Court Justice Ponders Impact of AI on Law
entry.summary: Justice Roberts emphasized AI's ability to aid people, but also 'dehumanize' the legal processes.

entry.title: Before AI Puts Us Out of Work, AI Jobs Could Pay Well
entry.summary: AI jobs are paying on average 77% more than other jobs, with entry-level positions paying more than twice the average salary.

entry.title: Three Possible Scenarios for Bitcoin ETFs in 2024
entry.summary: Will they or won’t they? The SEC is on the clock and crypto markets eagerly await its decision on a Bitcoin ETF. Here’s what could happen.

entry.summary:

entry.title: Gaming Tokens IMX, SAND and AXS Plunge Following Bitcoin Flash Crash
entry.summary: Immutable, The Sandbox, Axie Infinity, and Gala tokens dropped 8-15%, facing deeper losses after Bitcoin’s dip.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Upgrade Could Create a Centralized Fork, Says BRC-20 Creator
entry.summary: The latest drama in Bitcoin inscriptions swirls around the BRC-20 protocol, which allows the creation of meme coins.

entry.title: Bearish Bitcoin ETF Report Spooks Market—But Analysts Say Denial Is Unlikely
entry.summary: A line about approval by Q2 2024 didn’t calm fears. The suggestion that none of the ETF applications will be approved in January panicked the market.

entry.title: Solana's MixMob Launches 'Race-to-Earn' Game Ahead of Airdrop, Saga Phone Perks
entry.summary: MixMob's Racer 1 lets players gamble on races or earn crypto for wins. An airdrop is coming, along with benefits for Solana Saga owners.

entry.title: Bitcoin Plunges 7% to $42,000 in Flash Crash as Bull Run Falters
entry.summary: The price of Bitcoin plunged by over 7% in the past 24 hours, erasing the past week's gains in a matter of minutes.

entry.title: Michael Saylor to Sell $216 Million in MicroStrategy Stock Options, Buy More Bitcoin
entry.summary: MicroStrategy co-founder Michael Saylor plans to "acquire additional Bitcoin" for his personal holdings with some of the proceeds of the sale.

entry.title: AI Powered Cybercrime Will Explode in 2024: CrowdStrike Executive
entry.summary: Security exec Shawn Henry says the capability of AI to deceive and misinform is coming of age just in time for the 2024 elections.

entry.title: Midjourney Leaps into AI Video Creation
entry.summary: The AI image generator MidJourney will begin training its video model in the upcoming days and they expect to release a final product "in a few months"

entry.title: Here’s When to Expect the Jupiter JUP Airdrop for Solana DeFi Users
entry.summary: Jupiter’s airdrop draws nearer and nearer. Here’s when the Solana DEX aggregator plans to launch JUP to the community.

entry.title: Open Source or OpenAI: What's the Best Path to Advanced AI?
entry.summary: A long tweet went viral among AI enthusiasts, revisiting a decades-long debate over how AI will best evolve.

entry.title: Crypto Traders Flock to Sei and Its Dragon Ball-Inspired Meme Coin—Will It Last?
entry.summary: The Dragon Ball-themed SEIYAN meme coin has been gathering energy—and gains—on the Sei Network's Layer 1 blockchain.

entry.title: Solana NFT Sales Skyrocket, Topping Ethereum in Monthly Volume for First Time
entry.summary: Rising momentum around Solana catapulted NFT sales above Ethereum in December, according to data from CryptoSlam.

entry.title: Sell Signal? Jim Cramer Pulls U-Turn on Bitcoin
entry.summary: The infamous crypto skeptic admits Bitcoin's resilience in the face of government pressure.

entry.title: Drake Reveals Crypto Casino Stake's Rebranded F1 Racing Team
entry.summary: Sauber's F1 team is now officially the Stake team. Rapper, spokesperson, and frequent bettor Drake took to social media to share the news.

entry.title: Dymension Is the Latest Airdrop for Solana, Ethereum, and Cosmos Users
entry.summary: More than a million crypto users and NFT owners across chains can now claim DYM tokens in Dymension’s airdrop.

entry.title: ESL Faceit Group Exploring Blockchain 'Opportunistically,' Says Exec
entry.summary: Sam Braithwaite—ESL Faceit Group's VP of Game Ecosystems, Mobile, and Snapdragon Pro Series—shares the esports firm's approach to blockchain technology with GG's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Bryan Johnson Explains His Quest for Immortality and Why He Started with the Penis
entry.summary: Billionaire biohacker Bryan Johnson shared with Decrypt's Jason Nelson why he began his longevity quest and how technology has shaped the endeavor. Johnson also discusses some of his controversial experiments.

entry.title: Wildcard's Plans for 2024 with Founders Paul and Katy Bettner
entry.summary: Wildcard developers Paul and Katy Bettner tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about why they see their game as a "Web3 game," not a crypto game, and share why they've stuck with their initial vision despite the challenging broader market.

entry.title: Decrypt and Rug Radio Merge to Create Global Web3 Publishing Company
entry.summary: Decrypt and Rug Radio have announced their intent to merge, creating the world’s biggest decentralized publishing company. Codenamed [REDACTED], the alliance is aimed at revolutionizing tech-media, bringing together the forces of content creation and consumption.

entry.title: 'If You Play Well, You're Gonna be Rewarded': How FPS Web3War is Bringing 'Skill-to-Earn' to Crypto Gaming
entry.summary: Roll1ng Thund3rz co-founder Valentin Cobelea and Zilliqa CEO Matt Dyer joined Decrypt to discuss how the new FPS game Web3War is shaking up the crypto gaming space with a novel "skill to earn" mechanic that rewards players for high-quality gameplay.

entry.title: Creating peaceful money & taking over your local government w/ Joseph Schiarizzi
entry.summary:

entry.title: INTERVIEW: Ember Sword CEO Says NFT Games Are More 'Transparent'
entry.summary: Ember Sword CEO Mark Laursen shares why some big game studios "irk" him—and why he got into game development.
